meanings.definition: A parasitic infection caused by the larval stage of the pork tapeworm.
meanings.sent1: Cysticercosis can make you very sick.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the patient with cysticercosis.
meanings.sent3: Having cysticercosis is like having unwelcome guests in your body.
meanings.sent4: The spread of cysticercosis in the community was like a silent invasion.
meanings.sent5: The effects of cysticercosis on the body are alarming and dangerous.

meanings.definition: The presence of cysticerci in the body, typically in the muscles or brain.
meanings.sent1: The MRI revealed cysticercosis in the patient's brain.
meanings.sent2: Cysticercosis in the muscles can cause pain and weakness.
meanings.sent3: Finding cysticercosis in unexpected places is like a surprise treasure hunt.
meanings.sent4: The impact of cysticercosis on the body was like a hidden time bomb.
meanings.sent5: The image of cysticercosis invading the body is unsettling and unforgettable.
